page.title: SirNukes texts
page.t: Enables modification of the target monitor
Switches the data layout to be denser and include distance, speed, and ETA
Bolds the shield and hull percentages
Adds color to shield and hull percentages
Colors the target name based on faction
Lightens the general text coloring for readability
Appends the equivelent X3 class (eg. m3, tl) to ship types
